title: Remembering the Easter Sunday victims
body_lines: Relatives of Easter Sunday bomb victims in Sri Lanka were seen holding the pictures of their loved ones who died in the attack at a protest held in Negombo Town on the failure of the Sri Lankan government to bring the masterminds of the attacks to justice. Archbishop of Colombo Cardinal Malcolm Ranjith participated in the protest together with other religious leaders. Pix By Pradeep Pathirana
